title: Midtown Madness
description:
Midtown Madness

Angel Studios developed Midtown Madness, a major title that Microsoft recently published as part of its highly successful "Madness" line of PC racing games. In this shot of urban adrenaline, take your need for speed out of narrow tracks and into the most realistic interactive simulation of a big city ever developed for a racing game. Blow by traffic in officially licensed vehicles--from conservative sedans and road rockets, to powerful trucks and massive buses. In all of the Single Player and Multiplayer scenarios, face unique variations on the ultimate driving challenge: To win, you must use strategy and skill to navigate at high speeds and in all type of weather through a crowded city full of traffic, cops, and secret shortcuts.

InFo:
Publisher.....Microsoft Game Studios
Developer.....Rockstar San Diego
Genre.........Mission-based Driving
Release Date..Apr 30, 1999 

Minimum System Requirements:
System........Pentium-200 or equivalent
RAM...........16 MB 

Review....http://www.gamespot.com/pc/driving/midtownmadness/index.html
